species.name: frillish
descriptions: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.
It envelops its prey in its veillike arms and draws it down to the deeps, five miles below the ocean’s surface.
It wraps its veillike arms and legs around prey swimming by and drags them down to the depths of the ocean.
Legend has it that the residents of a sunken ancient city changed into these Pokémon.
They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
